title: Aperol
body: A proprietary name for  an orange-coloured Italian aperitif flavoured with gentian, rhubarb, and a variety of herbs and roots.

title: denialist
body: A person who denies the existence or reality of something, esp. something which is supported by the majority of scientific or historical evidence

title: hygge
body: A Danish word for a quality of cosiness that comes from doing simple things such as lighting candles, baking, or spending time at home with your family

title: quilling
body: The action or practice of bribing electors in order to gain their votes, especially by providing free alcohol
